parameters.name: DeviceName
parameters.description: The unique ID of the device.

parameters.name: DeviceFleetName
parameters.description: The name of the fleet the devices belong to.

nested_items.name: DeviceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the device.

nested_items.name: DeviceName
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the device.

nested_items.name: DeviceFleetName
nested_items.description: The name of the fleet the device belongs to.

nested_items.name: IotThingName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Internet of Things (IoT) object thing name associated with the device.

nested_items.name: RegistrationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the last registration or de-reregistration.

nested_items.name: LatestHeartbeat
nested_items.description: The last heartbeat received from the device.

nested_items.name: LatestSampleTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the last data sample taken.

nested_items.name: LatestInference
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the last inference that was made.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The response from the last list when returning a list large enough to need tokening.
